name: Where is that Bustling Marketplace?
description:
This game was made for the 7th Touhou Fan Game Jam in 3 days.

Chimata wants to join the big market in the human village, but she doesn't know how to get there! Ask for indications and rush through the town's streets to find that bustling marketplace before it closes. 

- Controls

Pick direction: Arrow Keys

Confirm: Z

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We wanted to use Chimata's theme but couldn't find any composer for this Jam. If you have made an arrangement and would like it to be part of the game please contact Coconzilla#9194 on Discord. 

Programming and Game Design: Coconzilla

3D and Pixel Art: Rokman

2D Art: Scarf

Music from https://incompetech.com/

"Frogs Legs Rag"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
